page.title: 13LONG CASE CLOCKS
page.content: {Fine Clocks by Richard Broughton of {Longhope.}As you drive up the hill at Little London from Gloucester, you pass an unusual shop on your left hand side. It is a{Clock shop}which specialises in long case clocks. The clocks are made by Richard Broughton in Longhope. The woods used are oak, mahogany or padouk. There are 3 sizes: {Grandfather}82 inches high,{ {Grandmother }74 inches high and{ Grand {daughter }65 inches high.The clock faces are patterned in the traditional way on steel or on brass. Customers can have their names painted or engraved on the faces. Wall_mounted Hall clocks and{Wooden-framed} clocks are also made. The workshop is in Longhope where custom made bedroom and kitchen furniture is also made.
